entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
